thread.title: Judge’s Decision Pushes Bon-Ton to Liquidation

author: Lillian Rizzo
title: Judge’s Decision Pushes Bon-Ton to Liquidation

organizations.name: dw partners and landlords namdar realty group

text:
The survival of Bon-Ton Stores Inc. suffered a blow on Wednesday when a bankruptcy judge denied bid-protection payments to a potential bidder that wants to keep the chain alive.
Judge Mary Walrath of the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in New York denied the payment of up to $500,000 to a group including New York investment firm DW Partners and landlords Namdar Realty Group and Washington Prime Group.
